articles.title: New Suitor May Enter Fray for Tribune Publishing - The New York Times
articles.description: A Maryland hotel magnate who had a deal to buy The Baltimore Sun is now weighing a bid for all of Tribune’s newspapers that could thwart a hedge fund’s plan.

articles.title: Prices will rise because of stimulus, but that won't last, Janet Yellen says - CNN
articles.description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she didn't think inflation posed a significant risk now that the Biden administration's covid relief is signed and on its way to implementation.
